thread.title: Fidelity leads oversubscribed $55mm Series C round for Afferent
thread.title_full: Fidelity leads oversubscribed $55mm Series C round for Afferent

title: Fidelity leads oversubscribed $55mm Series C round for Afferent
text:
Fidelity leads oversubscribed $55mm Series C round for Afferent Deal Date: Jul-01-2015 / Deal # 201530546 Executive Summary 
Afferent Pharmaceuticals Inc. (cardiology, respiratory, neurology, and urology targets in C-fiber primary afferent nerves) closed an oversubscribed $55mm Series C round led by new backer Fidelity Management & Research and including other first-time shareholders Jennison Associates, Partner Fund Management, Redmile Group, Tekla Healthcare Investors, Tekla Life Science Investors, and a blue chip investment fund, plus existing investor New Leaf Ventures.
